text.author: Wikinews
text.title: Wikinews interviews New York bar owner on Santorum cocktail
text.summary: Wikinews interviews Jonathan M. Stan, co-owner of the Pacific Standard bar in New York, about his Santorum Cocktail, which alludes to columnist Dan Savage's campaign to define 'santorum' as a frothy by-product of anal sex, in protest of comments made by former Pennsylvania Senator Rick Santorum against homosexuality.
